verses.verse: ( Moses Blesses the Twelve Tribes) וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> wə·zōṯ This הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> hab·bə·rā·ḵāh is the blessing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> bê·raḵ pronounced מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ’îš the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm of God אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê upon the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> mō·w·ṯōw his death.

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> way·yō·mar He said: יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah·weh “ The LORD מִסִּינַ֥י <WH5514> mis·sî·nay from Sinai בָּא֙ <WH935> bā came וְזָרַ֤ח <WH2224> wə·zā·raḥ and dawned מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> miś·śê·‘îr from Seir; לָ֔מוֹ Prep│3mp ( lā·mōw) upon us הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ 3313 V-Hifil-Perf-3ms ( hō·w·p̄î·a‘) He shone forth מֵהַ֣ר 2022 Prep-m│N-msc ( mê·har) from Mount פָּארָ֔ן 6290 N-proper-fs ( pā·rān) Paran וְאָתָ֖ה 857 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·’ā·ṯāh) and came מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת 7233 Prep-m│Number-fpc ( mê·riḇ·ḇōṯ) with myriads קֹ֑דֶשׁ 6944 N-ms ( qō·ḏeš) of holy ones, מִֽימִינ֕וֹ 3225 Prep-m│N-fsc│3ms ( mî·mî·nōw) at His right hand. אֵשְׁדָּת 799 N-csc ( ʾē·šə·då̄ṯ) with flaming fire לָֽמוֹ׃ Prep│3mp ( lā·mōw)

אַ֚ף <WH637> ’ap̄ Surely חֹבֵ֣ב <WH2245> ḥō·ḇêḇ You love עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm the people; כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <WH6918> qə·ḏō·šāw the holy ones [are] בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏe·ḵā in Your hand, וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> wə·hêm and they תֻּכּ֣וּ <WH8497> tuk·kū sit down לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <WH7272> lə·raḡ·le·ḵā at Your feet; ( Or they follow in Your steps) יִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> yiś·śā each receives מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1703> mid·dab·bə·rō·ṯe·ḵā Your words —

תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> tō·w·rāh the law צִוָּה־ <WH6680> ṣiw·wāh- gave לָ֖נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us, מֹשֶׁ֑ה 4872 N-proper-ms ( mō·šeh) that Moses מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה 4181 N-fs ( mō·w·rā·šāh) the possession קְהִלַּ֥ת 6952 N-fsc ( qə·hil·laṯ) of the assembly יַעֲקֹֽב׃ 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) of Jacob.

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî So [the LORD] became בִישֻׁר֖וּן <WH3484> ḇî·šu·rūn in Jeshurun ( Jeshurun means the upright one, a term of endearment for Israel; also in verse 26.) מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ King בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <WH622> bə·hiṯ·’as·sêp̄ gathered, רָ֣אשֵׁי <WH7218> rā·šê when the leaders עָ֔ם <WH5971> ‘ām of the people יַ֖חַד <WH3162> ya·ḥaḏ [came] together. שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> šiḇ·ṭê when the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel

יְחִ֥י <WH2421> yə·ḥî live רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> rə·’ū·ḇên Let Reuben וְאַל־ <WH408> wə·’al- and not יָמֹ֑ת <WH4191> yā·mōṯ die, וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> wî·hî nor ( Or but let) מְתָ֖יו <WH4962> mə·ṯāw his men מִסְפָּֽר׃ס <WH4557> mis·pār be few. ”

וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> wə·zōṯ And לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> lî·hū·ḏāh concerning Judah וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> way·yō·mar he said: שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> šə·ma‘ hear יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh “ O LORD, ק֣וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl the cry יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> yə·hū·ḏāh of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- to עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw his people. תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <WH935> tə·ḇî·’en·nū and bring him יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏāw With his own hands רָ֣ב <WH7378> rāḇ he defends his cause ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) ..., וְעֵ֥זֶר 5828 Conj-w│N-ms ( wə·‘ê·zer) a help מִצָּרָ֖יו 6862 Prep-m│N-mpc│3ms ( miṣ·ṣā·rāw) against his foes. ” תִּהְיֶֽה׃ס 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-2ms ( tih·yeh) but may You be

וּלְלֵוִ֣י <WH3878> ū·lə·lê·wî Concerning Levi אָמַ֔ר <WH559> ’ā·mar he said: תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <WH8550> tum·me·ḵā “ [Give] Your Thummim [to Levi] וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH224> wə·’ū·re·ḵā and Your Urim לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> lə·’îš one, ( DSS and LXX; MT does not include to Levi; literally Let Your Perfections and Your Lights be to Your godly one.) חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <WH2623> ḥă·sî·ḏe·ḵā to Your godly אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer whom נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <WH5254> nis·sî·ṯōw You tested בְּמַסָּ֔ה <WH4532> bə·mas·sāh at Massah ( Massah means testing; see .) תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <WH7378> tə·rî·ḇê·hū and contested עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- at מֵ֥י <WH4325> mê the waters מְרִיבָֽה׃ <WH4809> mə·rî·ḇāh of Meribah. ( Meribah means quarreling; see .)

הָאֹמֵ֞ר <WH559> hā·’ō·mêr He said לְאָבִ֤יו <WH1> lə·’ā·ḇîw of his father וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> ū·lə·’im·mōw and mother, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō ‘ I do not רְאִיתִ֔יו <WH7200> rə·’î·ṯîw consider them. ’ וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> ’e·ḥāw his brothers לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō He disregarded הִכִּ֔יר <WH5234> hik·kîr ... וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - בָּנוֹ <WH1121> bå̄·nō his own sons, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō and did not יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> yā·ḏā‘ know כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî for שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> šā·mə·rū he kept ( Hebrew they kept, most likely referring to Levi in the plural; similarly twice in verse 10) אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <WH565> ’im·rā·ṯe·ḵā Your word וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <WH1285> ū·ḇə·rî·ṯə·ḵā Your covenant. יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> yin·ṣō·rū and maintained

יוֹר֤וּ <WH3384> yō·w·rū He will teach מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH4941> miš·pā·ṭe·ḵā Your ordinances לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> lə·ya·‘ă·qōḇ to Jacob וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <WH8451> wə·ṯō·w·rā·ṯə·ḵā and Your law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> lə·yiś·rā·’êl to Israel; יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> yā·śî·mū he will set קְטוֹרָה֙ <WH6988> qə·ṭō·w·rāh incense בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> bə·’ap·pe·ḵā before You וְכָלִ֖יל <WH3632> wə·ḵā·lîl and whole burnt offerings עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4196> miz·bə·ḥe·ḵā Your altar.

בָּרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> bā·rêḵ Bless יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> ḥê·lōw his substance, וּפֹ֥עַל <WH6467> ū·p̄ō·‘al the work יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw of his hands. תִּרְצֶ֑ה <WH7521> tir·ṣeh and accept מְחַ֨ץ <WH4272> mə·ḥaṣ Smash מָתְנַ֧יִם <WH4975> mā·ṯə·na·yim the loins קָמָ֛יו <WH6965> qā·māw of those who rise against him, וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <WH8130> ū·mə·śan·’āw and of his foes מִן־ <WH4480> min- so they can יְקוּמֽוּן׃ס <WH6965> yə·qū·mūn rise [no more]. ”

לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <WH1144> lə·ḇin·yā·min Concerning Benjamin אָמַ֔ר <WH559> ’ā·mar he said: יְדִ֣יד <WH3039> yə·ḏîḏ “ May the beloved יְהֹוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> yiš·kōn rest לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> lā·ḇe·ṭaḥ secure עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw in Him; חֹפֵ֤ף <WH2653> ḥō·p̄êp̄ [God] shields ( LXX; Hebrew He shields) עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> ‘ā·lāw him כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm day long, וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> ū·ḇên ... כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <WH3802> kə·ṯê·p̄āw and upon His shoulders שָׁכֵֽן׃ס <WH7931> šā·ḵên he rests. ”

וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> ū·lə·yō·w·sêp̄ Concerning Joseph אָמַ֔ר <WH559> ’ā·mar he said: מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <WH1288> mə·ḇō·re·ḵeṯ be blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh by the LORD אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> ’ar·ṣōw “ May his land מִמֶּ֤גֶד <WH4022> mim·me·ḡeḏ with the precious שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> šā·ma·yim from heaven above מִטָּ֔ל <WH2919> miṭ·ṭāl dew וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> ū·mit·tə·hō·wm and the deep waters רֹבֶ֥צֶת <WH7257> rō·ḇe·ṣeṯ that lie תָּֽחַת׃ <WH8478> tā·ḥaṯ beneath,

וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> ū·mim·me·ḡeḏ with the bountiful תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <WH8393> tə·ḇū·’ōṯ harvest שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> šā·meš from the sun וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> ū·mim·me·ḡeḏ and the abundant גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH1645> ge·reš yield יְרָחִֽים׃ <WH3391> yə·rā·ḥîm of the seasons,

וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> ū·mê·rōš with the best הַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> har·rê- mountains קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> qe·ḏem of the ancient וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> ū·mim·me·ḡeḏ and the bounty גִּבְע֥וֹת <WH1389> giḇ·‘ō·wṯ hills, עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām of the everlasting

וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <WH4022> ū·mim·me·ḡeḏ with the choice gifts אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ of the land וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> ū·mə·lō·’āh and everything in it, וּרְצ֥וֹן <WH7522> ū·rə·ṣō·wn and with the favor שֹׁכְנִ֖י <WH7931> šō·ḵə·nî of Him who dwelt סְנֶ֑ה <WH5572> sə·neh in the burning bush. תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <WH935> tā·ḇō·w·ṯāh May these rest לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> lə·rōš on the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <WH6936> ū·lə·qā·ḏə·qōḏ and crown the brow נְזִ֥יר <WH5139> nə·zîr of the prince אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> ’e·ḥāw of his brothers.

בְּכ֨וֹר <WH1060> bə·ḵō·wr a firstborn שׁוֹר֜וֹ <WH7794> šō·w·rōw bull, הָדָ֣ר <WH1926> hā·ḏār majesty [is like] ל֗וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) His וְקַרְנֵ֤י 7161 Conj-w│N-fdc ( wə·qar·nê) and his horns רְאֵם֙ 7214 N-ms ( rə·’êm) of a wild ox. קַרְנָ֔יו 7161 N-fdc│3ms ( qar·nāw) are like those בָּהֶ֗ם Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) עַמִּ֛ים 5971 N-mp ( ‘am·mîm) the nations, יְנַגַּ֥ח 5055 V-Piel-Imperf-3ms ( yə·nag·gaḥ) With them he will gore יַחְדָּ֖ו 3162 Adv ( yaḥ·dāw) ... אַפְסֵי־ 657 N-mpc ( ’ap̄·sê-) even to the ends אָ֑רֶץ 776 N-fs ( ’ā·reṣ) of the earth. וְהֵם֙ 1992 Conj-w│Pro-3mp ( wə·hêm) Such רִבְב֣וֹת 7233 Number-fpc ( riḇ·ḇō·wṯ) are the myriads אֶפְרַ֔יִם 669 N-proper-ms ( ’ep̄·ra·yim) of Ephraim, וְהֵ֖ם 1992 Conj-w│Pro-3mp ( wə·hêm) and such אַלְפֵ֥י 505 Number-mpc ( ’al·p̄ê) are the thousands מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ס 4519 N-proper-ms ( mə·naš·šeh) of Manasseh. ”

וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <WH2074> wə·liz·ḇū·lun Concerning Zebulun אָמַ֔ר <WH559> ’ā·mar he said: שְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> śə·maḥ “ Rejoice, זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> zə·ḇū·lun Zebulun, בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <WH3318> bə·ṣê·ṯe·ḵā in your journeys, וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> wə·yiś·śā·š·ḵār and Issachar, בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH168> bə·’ō·hā·le·ḵā in your tents.

עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> ‘am·mîm the peoples הַר־ <WH2022> har- to a mountain; יִקְרָ֔אוּ <WH7121> yiq·rā·’ū They will call שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> šām there יִזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> yiz·bə·ḥū they will offer זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> ziḇ·ḥê- sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> ṣe·ḏeq of righteousness. כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî For שֶׁ֤פַע <WH8228> še·p̄a‘ the abundance יַמִּים֙ <WH3220> yam·mîm of the seas יִינָ֔קוּ <WH3243> yî·nā·qū they will feast on וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <WH8226> ū·śə·p̄ū·nê and the hidden טְמ֥וּנֵי <WH2934> ṭə·mū·nê treasures חֽוֹל׃ס <WH2344> ḥō·wl of the sand. ”

וּלְגָ֣ד <WH1410> ū·lə·ḡāḏ Concerning Gad אָמַ֔ר <WH559> ’ā·mar he said: בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1288> bā·rūḵ “ Blessed [is] מַרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> mar·ḥîḇ he who enlarges גָּ֑ד <WH1410> gāḏ [the domain of] Gad! כְּלָבִ֣יא <WH3833> kə·lā·ḇî like a lion שָׁכֵ֔ן <WH7931> šā·ḵên He lies down וְטָרַ֥ף <WH2963> wə·ṭā·rap̄ and tears off זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> zə·rō·w·a‘ an arm אַף־ <WH637> ’ap̄- or קָדְקֹֽד׃ <WH6936> qā·ḏə·qōḏ a head.
